comment.author: 63096769@N07
comment._content: This looks like the Corinth Canal in Greece.

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content:
Hi art1024,
Thanks for suggesting the Corinth Canal. We have updated our museum records accordingly. During their world circumnavigation on yacht SIRIUS, the Nossiters stopped at Crete and Cephalonia and then passed through the Corinth Canal.
comment.authorname: Australian National Maritime Museum on The Commons
